programme.title: Happy, Texas, (1999, Comedy)

programme.title: Carros Usados, Vendedores Pirados!, (2009, Comedy)

programme.title: O Foragido, (1998, Comedy)

programme.title: O Sequestro do nibus 657, (2015, Action)

programme.title: Trfico de Mulheres, (2020, Drama)

programme.title: A Bab, (2010, Drama)

programme.title: O Grito 3, (2009, Horror)

programme.title: Proud Mary, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Taraji P. Henson is Mary, a hit woman working for an organized crime family in Boston, whose life is completely turned around when she meets a young boy whose path she crosses when a professional hit goes bad.

programme.title: Heist, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: A jewel thief's nephew is sent along on a heist to ensure a longtime partner in crime stays honest about the division of the loot.

programme.title: 88 Minutes, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: A college professor, who moonlights as a forensic psychiatrist for the FBI, receives a death threat that says he has only 88 minutes to live. To save his life, he must use all his skills and training to narrow down the possible suspects.

programme.title: Reservoir Dogs, (1992, Drama)
programme.desc: After a seemingly perfectly planned robbery goes awry, a group of criminals begin to suspect there is a traitor in the ranks, and back at their headquarters try to suss out the culprit.

programme.title: Jackie Brown, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: A female flight attendant becomes a key figure in a plot between the police and an arms dealer.

programme.title: Donnie Darko (Theatrical Cut), (2001, Science fiction)

programme.title: Snowpiercer, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: After a failed global-warming experiment, a post-apocalyptic Ice Age has killed off nearly all life on the planet.

programme.desc: Lily is reserved and awkward, while Jarrod is an introspective oddball who's blind to Lily's affection for him -- until a celebration mixed with a strange plan to exact revenge on Jarrod's high school foe brings the two misfits together.

programme.title: Harold and Maude, (1971, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A classic cult film that features one of the screen's most unlikely pairs. It will defy everything you've ever seen or known about screen lovers.

programme.desc: The Davisons' family reunion goes awry when their home comes under siege by a mask-wearing team of crossbow-bearing assailants.

programme.title: 3 Days of the Condor, (1975, Thriller)
programme.desc: A mild-mannered CIA researcher, paid to read books, returns from lunch to find all of his co-workers assassinated. "Condor" must find out who did this and get in from the cold before the hitmen get him.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Tristan's back... but he's not who he appears to be when he kidnaps Mokuba! It's time for Kaiba to stop monkeying around and rescue his brother, but he's confronted by Big 5 Leichter!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Big 5's Satellite Cannon attacks Kaiba's monsters from deep space! Mokuba's unwavering faith in Kaiba inspires him to believe that his brother will pull out the victory, but Noah has plans to ruin their brotherhood...

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba arrives at Noah's sanctuary to rescue Mokuba, but Mokuba wants to stay with Noah! Has Mokuba seen the evil within Kaiba, or is something more sinister in the works?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah gives the Big Five one last chance to redeem themselves in a five-on-two tag team duel where Yugi and Joey take on the entire Big Five!
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five concentrate their attack on Joey so that Yugi would be forced to duel all alone! Outmanned and overpowered, Yugi and Joey are near the end of the line!
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five summon an almighty dragon that previously defeated Joey, Mai, and Mokuba! Joey and Yugi pull out all the stops, but is that enough to avoid their minds being scattered over virtual reality?
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a duel for control of KaibaCorp when Noah squares off against Kaiba! But can Kaiba fight at full strength after he learns the hidden truth about Noah... and the tragic past that made him what he is today?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah's Shinato's Ark steals monsters into its keep to use as an impenetrable wall of servants! How can Kaiba hurt Noah when Noah has an endless stream of monsters to protect himself with?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's about to finish Noah, but Mokuba protects Noah from his final blow! Will Kaiba sacrifice his beloved brother in exchange for freedom, or will the brotherly bond remain unbreakable?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: For every turn that passes, one of Yugi's friends is transformed into stone! As more and more of his friends harden into solid rock, can Yugi defeat Noah before he runs out of turns and transforms into stone himself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are petrified into solid stone statues, but their spirits live on! Their combined souls energize Yugi into a noble fight, but is spirit going to win the duel when Yugi's not drawing the right cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has defeated Noah... but they still can't escape from the virtual world! The real reason behind their entrapment is revealed... as is the true villain pulling the strings!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Kaiba squares off against his stepfather Gozaburo for their final battle, Yugi and friends are attacked by endless hordes of monsters! Their only hope is Noah, but they can't expect help from their enemy... can they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Time is almost up before the missile's explosion destroys Yugi and friends! Will the Battle City finalists beat the clock and live to duel another day in the stunning conclusion to the virtual world saga!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends arrive at KaibaCorp Island where the Battle City finalists will compete in the ultimate dueling arena! Get ready for the awesome four-person battle royal where any duelist can attack anyone else!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Honor, friendship, revenge... As each duelist remembers what they're fighting for, the battle royal rages on where none of the duelists know where the next attack is going to come from!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey may have fought some of the fiercest fights in Battle City, but has all his training taught him to become an elite duelist? Joey's gonna show what he's made of in the conclusion to the four-man battle royal!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik ensnares Joey in a Shadow Game where each duelist's heart is linked with his monsters... literally! Every time a monster received damage, the duelist feels the pain instead!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik's Helpoemer send Joey's powerful cards to the graveyard before Joey can use them! Running low on cards and life points, Joey's opportunities for staging a comeback are nearly depleted!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey thinks this duel can't turn any worse... but Marik has all the pieces necessary to summon The Winged Dragon of Ra! Can Joey prevent Marik from summoning the Egyptian God Card, or is victory simply not in the cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik transforms The Winged Dragon of Ra into its powerful form, the Egyptian God Phoenix! If Joey can't withstand the Phoenix's blazing fire, he'll lose the duel... plus his only chance to save Mai from her mental prison!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the rematch we've all been waiting for! Yugi and Kaiba square off for the first time since Duelist Kingdom in front of thousands of ravenous fans for the right to challenge Marik! It's time to duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba has all the monsters necessary to summon Obelisk the Tormentor to finish Yugi off! Though overwhelmed and outmatched, nothing is going to stop Yugi from trying to summon his Egyptian God first!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon clashes against Kaiba's Obelisk the Tormentor, what will happen when two Egyptian Gods fight each other? It's time to find out which Egyptian God is truly stronger!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The clash of the two Egyptian God Monsters releases mystical energies that show Yugi and Kaiba visions of the ancient Egyptian past! What new answers do these images unlock, and what prophecies do they make for the future?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons three powerful Blue-Eyes White Dragons, but Yugi has no monsters remaining in his deck! Is losing only a matter of time, or will a long-dormant card from a fallen friend help turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba not only controls Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, but his Final Attack Orders card leaves Yugi with only three cards in his deck! If Yugi loses, he'll have to give up his chance to save the world from Marik's evil!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Tired of Kaiba's insults, Joey challenges Kaiba for third place in the Battle City Tournament! Has Joey mastered enough strategies to take down the top dog, or is Kaiba going to wallop Joey like a pathetic puppy?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba attacks with his mighty Blue-Eyes White Dragon, but Joey has no monsters to defend with! Joey's luck has run out, so it's time for him to rely on skill!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey and Kaiba's battle reaches its roaring climax! Will Joey take down his biggest headache and actually teach Kaiba a thing or two about being a true duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the critical Battle City showdown with the fate of the world at stake: Yami Yugi vs. Marik! If Yami Yugi loses, Yugi is taking a permanent vacation into the Shadow Realm!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik proves his The Winged Dragon of Ra is the strongest Egyptian God Card by destroying Slifer the Sky Dragon! None of Yugi's cards can withstand its assault, but a gift from Kaiba may turn the duel around

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi can't strike Marik's life points, and with every turn that passes, Marik is one step closer to taking down Yugi with a final strike from The Winged Dragon of Ra...

programme.title: Luffy challenges Urashima, the strongest yokozuna in the Land of Wano, to a sumo match! Urashima even uses illegal moves to beat Luffy at any cost! Meanwhile, Holdem tells Otama that he knows she committed a crime and he has to punish her for it.

programme.sub-title: A Climactic Sumo Battle! Straw Hat vs. the Strongest Ever Yokozuna!

programme.sub-title: Luffy Rages! Rescue Otama from Danger!

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Taking Back Otama! A Fierce Fight Against Holdem!

programme.title: Taking down Holdem, Luffy rescues Otama and tries to catch up to Zoro and Okiku who stole the food treasure ship and started a mad dash to get out of the town!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Duel! The Magician and the Surgeon of Death!

programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Zoro and the others dash out of BakuraTown on the treasure ship filled with food! Luffy catches up to them bringing ahuge bucket of fresh water! Then, they distribute the food and the water to thepeople of Okobore Town who were thirsty and hungry.

programme.sub-title: The Coming of the Treasure Ship! LuffytaroReturns the Favor!

programme.sub-title: Mysterious Grave Markers! A Reunion at the Ruins of Oden Castle!

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Bringing Down the Emperor of the Sea! A Secret Raid Operation Begins!

programme.sub-title: Everyone is Annihilated! Kaido's Furious Blast Breath!

programme.title: After Luffy sees Kaido shattering the ruins of Oden Castle where he left his friends, he becomes enraged and attacks Kaido! Soon after, he finds out Kaido even assaulted Otama who was riding on Speed's back to her home.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Finally Clashing! The Ferocious Luffy vs. Kaido!

programme.title: An infuriated Luffy strikes blow after blow on the drunken Kaido. When he activates Gear Four Bounce-Man and launches even more powerful attacks, Kaido fights back and knocks him out with just one blow.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Destructive! One Shot, One Kill Thunder Bagua!

programme.title: Luffy gets beaten by Kaido and is sent to a great mine where prisoners are made to work in forced labor. There, he finds an unexpected reunion. Meanwhile, Okiku is rushing to the ruins of Oden Castle.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Living Hell! Luffy, Humiliated in the Great Mine!

programme.title: On Gloom Island in the Grand Line, Perona finds out that her captain, Gecko Moria, is alive and she is about to leave Dracule Mihawk who let her stay there for the last two years. Meanwhile,
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Holyland in Tumult! Emperor of the Sea Blackbeard Cackles!

programme.title: Dogstorm fights against Shutenmaru to ally with him for their operation but Shutenmaru still rejects their call.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: It's On! The Special Operation to Bring Down Kaido!

programme.title: In the Excavation Labor Camp, Luffy competes against Kid by hauling stones for food and they both get tons of it. However, Dobon, a vice warden, becomes furious when he finds out all their provisions are gone, and gives Luffy and Kid a new sentence.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Rampage! The Prisoners Luffy and Kid!

programme.title: Sanji's Special Soba becomes very popular but some gang members come to disturb his business and knock over a customer's bowl. Infuriated, Sanji takes them down and gives the customer, a little girl named Toko.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Great Sensation! Sanji's Special Soba!

programme.title: Wano's top courtesan Komurasaki is in procession and slowly makes her way to Orochi Palace. There is a crowd of people on the street as well as Sanji and the others. While everyone is fascinated by her, some seeking vengeance get in the Oiran's way.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luxurious and Gorgeous! Wano's Most Beautiful Woman Komurasaki!

programme.title: Zoro who has been wandering around the Land of Wano since he got separated from his friends meets a sycophant named Tonoyasu. Tonoyasu paid for Zoro's sushi and to pay him back, Zoro gambles at dice.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Tale of Chivalry! Zoro and Tonoyasu's Little Trip!

programme.title: Zoro is taken to the sycophant Tonoyasu's poor hometown, Ebisu Town where people laugh away their misfortune.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A State of Emergency! Big Mom Closes in!

programme.title: As the Big Mom Pirates approach the Land of Wano, Kaido's subordinates led by King and Queen try to get rid of them.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Capital in an Uproar! Another Assassin Targets Sanji!

programme.title: Sanji faces Page One, a Headliner of the Animal Kingdom Pirates, who questions the soba cook's true identity. Sanji uses Germa's device for the first time and transforms himself into Stealth Black while dubbing himself Soba Mask.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: While the banquet grows livelier at Orochi's Castle, Robin is confronted by his ninja force called Oniwabanshu. In the meanwhile in Kuri, Chopper, Tama, and Momonosuke train themselves preparing for the incoming battle.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Desperate Situation! Orochi's Menacing Oniwabanshu!

programme.title: At the banquet, the Shogun Orochi starts to talk about his late old enemy which bores the attendees. Suddenly, the Oiran's child attendant Toko bursts with laughter and won't stop. Orochi becomes furious and attacks her.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Pandemonium! The Monster Snake, Shogun Orochi!

programme.title: In order to save her child attendant Toko, the top Oiran Komurasaki stands up to the Shogun Orochi, but the yakuza boss Kyoshiro interrupts and does something that no one expected.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Flower Falls! The Final Moment of the Most Beautiful Woman in the Land of Wano!

programme.title: Nami, Robin, and the others got away from Oden's Castle and now discuss what they have found out about the enemy so far. Meanwhile, Chopper's group sets off to rescue Luffy from the Excavation Labor Camp.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Bond Between Prisoners! Luffy and Old Man Hyo!

programme.title: At the Excavation Labor Camp in Udon, Luffy tries to save Old Man Hyo and stands up to Vice Warden Daifuku and Warden Babanuki with his physical strength weakened by the Sea Prism Stone cuffs.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Lead Performer! Queen the Plague Emerges!

programme.title: Luffy and Old Man Hyo try to climb up the wall and break out of the Excavation Labor Camp, but Queen the Plague stands in their way and gives them a hard time!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy fights quite a few Queen's men at once in the deadly sumo match while protecting Old Man Hyo! Meanwhile, Nami, Robin, and Shinobu are cornered as Hawkins comes to raid the bathhouse.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dead or Alive! Queen's Sumo Inferno!

programme.title: Luffy deals with the endless supply of opponents trying to figure out the way to use Haki that Rayleigh taught him a while ago. Meanwhile, Zoro faces Gyukimaru who is accusing him of stealing Shusui.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Gyukimaru! Zoro Fights a Duel on Bandit's Bridge!

programme.title: The duel between Zoro and Gyukimaru is interrupted by Kamazo, Orochi's assassin who came after a little girl Toko. Without Shusui, Zoro has a hard time fighting the two at the same time, but he finds an unlikely third sword to take down the enemies.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Big Turnover! The Three-Sword Style Overcomes Danger!

programme.title: Luffy's next enemies in the deadly sumo match in the Excavation Labor Camp are two tough Gifters. Much to Old Man Hyo's surprise, Luffy keeps practicing using Haki properly at the same time as he fights them.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Zoro, Stunned! The Shocking Identity of the Mysterious Woman!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #12 Missed by a Dollar
programme.desc: At an auction in New York, attendees are shocked when a mysterious man bids $1,000,000 on a plain diamond ring. The man himself is even more astounded when the President of the World Bank outbids him by a single dollar. The man is Lupin!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata arrives in San Marino after receiving a note from Lupin III. Instead of a declaration of a new theft, it's a wedding invitation.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Marlow Brozzi, a soccer player from San Marino. A mafia member has proof that Brozzi is cheating so Brozzi approaches Lupin for help.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin and the gang managed to steal a fragment of Marie Antoinette's necklace, but Jigen has been captured by Nyx.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A toothache prompts Jigen to rush to a clinic in a ruined town. The doctor, Livia, says she'll only take a look at him if he'll let her hold on to his gun, so he has no choice but to hand it over.
programme.sub-title: With a Gun in My Hand

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Fujiko Mine is seen with the members of a failing circus troupe. A former member of the troupe, Tony Belacastro, known as the Magician, died ten years ago, but the secrets to his magic are written in his "Trick Recipes."

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: The widow Elena is the only one who knows where her late husband hid his fortune. Zenigata shows up to protect her from Lupin's gang, who are out to steal it from her. Zenigata and Elena go to her mountain retreat to hide from Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Nyx, Agent MI6 of the British Secret Service, values his wife and daughters above all others, so he keeps his identity as MI6 a secret from them. However, one of his daughters is kidnapped by some mysterious men.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: An eerie old castle converted to a hotel, known as the "The Mansion of the Cursed Bride," where the ghost of a bride is said to appear. It's said that a priceless treasure rests in the hotel, so Lupin and the gang pay a visit.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Long ago a dictator was assassinated, and the assassins involved were later killed one by one. Goemon was one of those involved in the assassination. A former bodyguard of the assassinated dictator, the legendary sniper Zora, might be out for revenge...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin is invited by both Fujiko and Rebecca to a couples-only wine auction party. Both women have their sights on the same thing: The Lovesick Pig, a legendary wine appearing in the auction.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca is kidnapped and Lupin must rescue her! Before she was kidnapped, Rebecca had been deciphering a book left behind by a genius scientist, and MI6 made the mysterious comment that it was the "Dream of Italy."

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin finally deciphers the book left behind by the genius scientist Uraga, and then mysteriously falls asleep. He ends up in a world where it's impossible to tell whether what he sees is a dream or reality. Is this the "Dream of Italy"?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has been arrested and imprisoned. He's tried everything he could to escape, but Zenigata stops him every time. Zenigata then sends Lupin to an even higher-security prison, just to be on the safe side. Has the end of Lupin III has come at last?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin is so broke that he doesn't know what he'll eat tomorrow, so he concocts a plan to steal the Mona Lisa. But the Mona Lisa won't be easy to steal. He does his best to weave through the security net Zenigata has set.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Like a she-devil, the diamond "Cleopatra's Soul" is constantly changing owners. In search of the diamond, Lupin arrives at what appears to be an ordinary school...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin, Jigen, and Goemon decide to go eat some tasty sushi, but when they hop in the car to leave, they find a dog inside. Lupin promises to drop the dog off with Fujiko while they're out getting sushi.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Greco is a man revered as a savior for defeating evildoers one after another. Everyone Greco targets die within 24 hours, killing and being killed by their own comrades. When provoked by Greco, Lupin and the gang head to Greco's church.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A mysterious portrait of Lupin appears at a major fashion show in Milan. When it's determined that the portraits have been painted by Leonardo Da Vinci, Lupin realizes something and rushes to the church where "The Last Supper" is displayed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While shopping with his family, Nyx is shot by someone and loses consciousness. He wakes up bound, and before he is Percival, his boss from his days as MI6.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has stolen the car that the famous singer Nora Anita loved and drove for nearly half a century. Zenigata and the police are after him, but they won't make a move for fear of damaging the priceless car. Where is Lupin headed in the treasured car?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While in Italy, Lupin gets a call from someone claiming to have kidnapped Fujiko. The kidnapper blackmails Lupin into stealing a marionette once owned by Gennai Hiraga and now being kept in a mansion in Tokyo.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Declarations of theft show up throughout the city, and they all bear the message "Tonight I'm going to get you, Lupin III," with a lipstick mark underneath. The one who's been distributing the notes is Rebecca.
programme.sub-title: I'm Going to Get You, Lupin

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Da Vinci announces that he is going to unveil his latest work in San Marino. Its title is "World Harmony." After the announcement, for some reason, people all around the Italian Peninsula fall unconscious... and Lupin and the gang are no exception.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca's personality is under Da Vinci's control. In an effort to save her, Lupin delves into her mind, where he struggles with all kinds of traps set by Da Vinci. He manages to find Rebecca's memories, but Da Vinci has overwritten all her memories.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin meets Rebecca to sign divorce papers, before they could finish they are attacked by zombies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca remembers the first time she meets Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #13: Alcatraz Connection
programme.desc: Master thief Lupin III, gunslinger Jigen and swordmaster Goemon are back for a new caper, this time aboard the casino-ship Machine Gun Kelly. Between the mafia, interpol, and a secret organization based under Alcatraz!

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 2: Texas Blood Money, (1999, Vampires)
programme.desc: When a gang of bank robbers makes a run for the border, they wander into the wrong bar and mess with the wrong vampires. It's kill-or-be-killed in the ultimate battle to stop these evil creatures and save their own lives!

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 3: Hangman's Daughter, (1999, Vampires)
programme.desc: Set in Mexico in the early 1900s, this prequel to the From Dusk Till Dawn series finds outlaw Johnny Madrid on the run from the hangman, with the hangman's daughter Esmeralda by his side. Together they are faced with the fight of their lives.

programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: Return To Lonesome Dove, (1993, Western)
programme.desc: Back in Texas, Capt. Call organizes a mustang drive to Montana. He hires a Gideon, a former Texas Ranger, to head the drive. Newt falls into trouble in is rescued by a crusty rancher named Dunnegan.
programme.sub-title: Return To Lonesome Dove: Part I - The Vision

programme.title: Return To Lonesome Dove, (1993, Western)
programme.desc: Clara's ranch meets an fiery fate, and she decides to join with Gideon. Call has the misfortune to meet up with the desperado Cherokee Jack. Dunnegan tells Newt of his inheritance plans.
programme.sub-title: Return To Lonesome Dove: Part III - The Legacy

programme.title: Return To Lonesome Dove, (1993, Western)

programme.sub-title: Return To Lonesome Dove: Part III - The Legacy

programme.sub-title: Return To Lonesome Dove: Part IV - The Passing

programme.title: True Grit, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: The cantankerous Rooster is hired by a headstrong young girl (Kim Darby) to find the man who murdered her father and fled with the family savings.

programme.desc: Depp stars in the title role as a man unjustly sent to prison who vows revenge, not only for his punishment, but for the devastating consequences that happened to his wife and daughter.

programme.desc: Almost a year has passed since Barrow, Alaskas population was decimated by vampires. Stella, mourning her husbands murder, has been travelling the world trying to convince others that vampires exist.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Sailor Guardians grow in strength with its newest member Sailor Jupiter joining the team. Sailor Moon is appointed as team leader.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi learns that a transfer student named Ryo Urawa seems to have a crush on Ami, and tries to help him out.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Naru attend an art exhibit by Yumemi Yumeno. Usagi and Mamoru are both asked by Yumemi to become models for her latest painting.
programme.sub-title: The Painting of Love: Usagi and Mamoru Get Closer

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Makoto discover Motoki has a girlfriend named Reika. His relationship is in jeopardy due to Reikas chance to study abroad.

programme.desc: Grandpa Hino has become emotionally unstable, causing Rei to worry. The new apprentice Yuichiro tries to cheer her up.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and friends meet a girl who they believe holds the final Rainbow Crystal. But they realize its her pet cat that possesses the Rainbow Crystal!

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Umino seems to have fallen in love with Naru. Naru only considers Umino a friend, so Usagi decides to play Cupid and urges them to go on a date.

programme.desc: When the exploits of a Sailor Moon imposter become quite the sensation, the real Sailor Guardians step in to investigate.

programme.desc: Usagi is haunted by dreams of Tuxedo Mask, who has been abducted by the Dark Kingdom. Minako takes Usagi to a popular hair salon hoping it will help.

programme.desc: Usagi and her friends go to a ski resort to participate in the Moon Princess Contest, unaware that its Kunzites plan to eliminate the Moon Princess.

programme.desc: Figure-skating Janelyn & Misha offer to coach. Usagi and her friends decide to investigate. Makoto begins to receive personal lessons from Misha.

programme.desc: Minako receives a surprise visit from Katarina, Minakos former partner. A tragic incident forced them to go their separate ways.

programme.title: Jogos Mortais 2
programme.desc: Jigsaw est de volta. O gnio brilhante e perturbado retorna para outra rodada de jogos mortais horripilantes.

programme.title: Jogos Mortais 3
programme.desc: Ao lado de sua nova aprendiz Amanda,o manipulador por trs dos jogos cruis e complexos, que aterrorizaram uma comunidade e chocaram a polcia, mais uma vez escapa de ser capturado e desaparece.

programme.title: Jogos Mortais 4
programme.desc: Jigsaw e sua aprendiz Amanda morreram. Depois de ficarem sabendo do homicdio do Detetive Kerry, dois agentes veteranos do FBI, Agente Strahm e Agente Perez, auxiliam o Detetive Hoffman a organizar os restos do ltimo jogo de Jigsaw.

programme.title: Jogos Mortais 5
programme.desc: No quinto captulo da franquia Jogos Mortais, o Detetive Hoffman parece ser a ltima pessoa viva a continuar o legado do Jigsaw. Mas quando o seu segredo ameaado, Hoffman precisa ir caa para eliminar todos os assuntos inacabados.

programme.title: Sobrenatural: Captulo 2
programme.desc: A sequncia arrapiante de Sobrenatural conta a histria da famlia assombrada Lambert, que procura descobrir o segredo de infncia misterioso que a deixou perigosamente ligada ao mundo dos espritos.

programme.title: Sobrenatural: A Origem
programme.desc: Elise Rainier concorda relutantemente em usar sua habilidade de contatar os mortos para ajudar uma adolescente que se tornou alvo de uma perigosa entidade sobrenatural.

programme.title: Pegadas na neve
programme.desc: O perigo ronda uma montanha de neve. Cinco pessoas exploram uma regio nos alpes em busca de uma planta com propriedades medicinais.

programme.title: Tubares de Gelo
programme.desc: Uma nova raa de tubares vorazes e agressivos racha o fundo do oceano congelado de uma estao de pesquisa do rtico, devorando todos os que caem.

programme.title: V/H/S - Viral
programme.desc: Em busca da fama na internet, um grupo de adolescentes comea a filmar fenmenos estranhos. Mas eles no sabem que s conseguiro a ateno desejada quando forem protagonistas de acontecimentos sobrenaturais e sangrentos.

programme.title: Circus Kane - O Circo dos Horrores
programme.desc: Um grupo convidado para um misterioso jogo em uma casa de horrores, sob a promessa de um prmio de 250,000 dlares para aquele que sobreviver.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubaro de 3 Cabeas
programme.desc: A maior mquina de matar do mundo trs vezes mais mortal quando um tubaro mutante ameaa um navio de cruzeiro. Os passageiros lutam contra o predador mortal usando tudo que podem encontrar.

programme.title: O Dia Da Mmia
programme.desc: O arquelogo Jack Wells explora a tumba do rei Neferu na esperana de recuperar um diamante lendrio quando a mmia do rei retornar dos mortos em busca de vtimas humanas.

programme.title: Foras do Mal
programme.desc: Cinco histrias macabras giram em torno de um controle remoto, um rdio estranho, uma garota de programa assassina (Camille Lacey), um noivado e um fantasma.

programme.title: Os Suspeitos
programme.desc: Cinco criminosos de carreira so apanhados no enredo labirntico do filme que envolve um gnio do crime intrigante, raramente visto e quase lendrio chamado Keyser Soze.

programme.title: At o Fim!
programme.desc: O ex-soldado de Operaes Especiais Jake Hunter est desesperado para encontrar sua filha desaparecida. Enquanto Jake descobre a terrvel verdade em torno do desaparecimento dela, ele parte em uma busca impiedosa por vingana.

programme.title: A Fuga
programme.desc: Para sair da priso, um criminoso pede a esposa para negociar sua liberdade com um chefe da mfia. Mas quando o plano d errado, o casal tenta fugir para o Mxico.

programme.title: Alvo Duplo
programme.desc: Dois caras dures e pertencentes a lados opostos da lei vo unir foras para dar um ponto final em uma onda de assassinatos brutais, mas a tarefa no ser nada fcil e muito sangue vai rolar.

programme.title: Dose Dupla
programme.desc: Dois agentes especiais precisam se unir contra um cartel de drogas mexicano depois que uma operao secreta acaba gerando resultados catastrficos.

programme.title: Cdigo de Honra
programme.desc: Um ex-coronel das foras especiais se torna um vigilante que mata criminosos, enquanto um ex-colega quer det-lo.

programme.title: Ruas Em Guerra
programme.desc: Quando o implacvel Lord Rincon e sua gangue MS-13 recrutam Miguel, de 10 anos, para trabalhar como um de seus entregadores de drogas, Lucas, irmo mais velho de Miguel e que tambm trabalha para o bandido, est desesperado para manter o garoto seguro.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A vingana do drago
programme.desc: O lendrio lutador de Muay Thai Tong Po assassina Eric Sloane covardemente em uma luta. O irmo de Eric, Kurt Sloane, que sempre viveu sua sombra, desencadeia um grande e forte desejo por vingana.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A Retaliao
programme.desc: Kurt Sloan prometeu a si mesmo que no voltaria para a Tailndia, mas algum o seda e o fora a retornar ao pas asitico.

programme.title: Risco Absoluto
programme.desc: Liberado aps seis anos preso por um crime que no cometeu, Shane Daniels no demora a se meter novamente em encrenca. Ele testemunha um crime e para salvar uma jovem sequestrada se envolve com a mfia chinesa, russos e policiais corruptos.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: Quando uma expedio desaparece no Congo, um grupo enviado para procura-la, em uma aventura cheia de acontecimentos, tecnologia e muito suspense.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite
programme.desc: Selene, uma guerreira vampira, est imersa em um conflito entre vampiros e lobisomens, enquanto se apaixona por Michael, um humano que procurado por lobisomens por razes desconhecidas.

programme.title: Teia de Corrupo
programme.desc: Liam um ex-presidirio que tenta reconquistar o amor e a confiana de sua famlia. A busca de redeno de Liam o levar a uma rede de conspirao, crime e corrupo.

programme.title: A Face Oculta da Lei
programme.desc: A investigao de um roubo com homicdio desencadeia uma srie de eventos que faro com que um policial corrupto do LAPD questione suas tticas.

programme.title: Cdigo Mortal
programme.desc: A problemtica policial Billie Palmer comanda uma fora-tarefa que tenta impedir uma onda de crimes de um serial killer. Com a ajuda de uma equipe composta por especialistas e religiosos, ela corre contra o tempo e seus conflitos para resolver o caso.

programme.title: Entre a Vida e a Morte
programme.desc: Ben Garvey leva uma vida simples ao lado de sua esposa Lisa e a filha Katie. Ele trabalha duro no Fort Garry Brewery Company, mas ainda est em perodo de experincia. quando recebe a visita de seu irmo Ricky, que acabou de deixar a priso.

programme.title: O Homem da Mfia
programme.desc: Um assalto a um jogo de pquer ilegal, cujos participantes eram integrantes da mfia, abala o mundo do crime. Um matador profissional contratado para investigar o caso, mas a hesitao de alguns dos participantes coloca a situao fora de controle.

programme.title: Tempo Esgotado
programme.desc: estao de L.A., o contador Gene mergulha num pesadelo. Dois estranhos separam Watson de sua filha, jogam uma arma na mo dele e prope uma diablica troca: matar uma importante candidata poltico ou nunca mais rever sua filha. A contagem comea...

programme.title: A Hospedeira
programme.desc: Quando um inimigo invisvel ameaa a humanidade assumindo seus corpos e apagando suas memrias, Melanie Stryder arrisca tudo para proteger as pessoas com quem se importa.

programme.title: Ataque do Tubaro Mutante
programme.desc: Um tubaro gigante afunda um barco-escola em alto-mar. Sobreviventes do bizarro desastre refugiam-se em um atol, mas quando a mar comea a subir, o tubaro mutante de duas cabeas ressurge e ningum est a salvo da fera voraz.

programme.title: Pnico em Seattle
programme.desc: Quando uma grande tempestade ameaa o noroeste do Pacfico, uma famlia deve se encontrar e trabalhar junta para acabar com a tempestade antes que ela se espalhe alm de seu controle e aniquile o planeta!

programme.title: A Era da Escurido
programme.desc: No sculo 23, o Major Mitch Hunter (Jane) lidera uma luta contra um exrcito de necromutantes que habitam o submundo.

programme.title: Megaterremoto
programme.desc: Enquanto um terremoto de enorme proporo ameaa atingir a cidade de So Francisco, uma equipe de especialistas em desastres naturais trabalha para salvar o maior nmero de vidas possvel antes que a cidade seja completamente destruda.

programme.title: Fogo no Cu
programme.desc: Em 1975, o madeireiro Travis Walton (D.B. Sweeney) e seus colegas descobriram um OVNI. Seus amigos escaparam, mas Walton no teve a mesma sorte. Ele foi capturado pela estranha nave, exposto a vrios estudos mdicos dolorosos e sinistros.

programme.title: Xeque-Mate
programme.desc: Um caso de identidade equivocada coloca Slevin no meio de uma guerra sendo tramada por dois dos chefes do crime mais rivais da cidade. Sob vigilncia constante do detetive Brikowski e do assassino Goodkat, ele deve peg-los antes que eles o peguem.

programme.title: Conspirao Americana
programme.desc: Mary Surratt a nica mulher acusada como cmplice no julgamento do assassinato de Abraham Lincoln. Enquanto toda a nao se volta contra ela, ela forada a confiar em seu advogado relutante para descobrir a verdade e salvar sua vida.

programme.title: Um Plano Brilhante
programme.desc: Na Londres de 1960, um faxineiro convence uma executiva frustrada a planejar o roubo de diamantes na empresa onde trabalham. Chocada com a proposta do educado senhor, ela aceita, mas no demora muito para um investigador desconfie dela.

programme.title: A Lista (2008)
programme.desc: Um contador levado por seu amigo advogado a uma misteriosa casa de swing chamada The List. Mas nesse novo mundo, ele logo se torna o principal suspeito do desaparecimento de uma mulher e de um roubo multimilionrio.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Para deter um assassino racista, Shaft precisa localizar as nicas testemunhas que podem coloc-lo atrs das grandes. O perigo s aumenta enquanto Shaft investiga.

programme.title: A Hora do Acerto
programme.desc: Para a Gangue dos 5, tudo um videogame: matar policiais, armar emboscadas e criar requintes de crueldade. Quem se torna vtima de suas armadilhas o inspetor de polcia Wing e todo o seu time de policiais, que so brutalmente assassinados.

programme.title: O Matador - Misso Resgate
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele est cuidando sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: Fora do Rumo
programme.desc: Um detetive de Hong Kong se une a um jogador americano para lutar contra um notrio criminoso chins.

programme.title: Hitman - O Rei dos Assassinos
programme.desc: Um antigo chefe da mfia japonesa suspeita de ser vtima de um ataque e deixa uma recompensa para a pessoa que encontrar o seu assassino.

programme.title: Juiz Arqueiro
programme.desc: Um homem, que encarregado de resolver algumas discuptas entre academinas rivais de artes marciais fica dividido. Ele no sabe se escolhe cumprir o dever do que lhe foi delegado ou se vinga a horna de sua famlia.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caador de Encrenca
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresrio em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: Ip Man - O Mestre do Kung Fu
programme.desc: Durante o tempo em que foi capito da polcia na cidade de Foshan, Ip Man perseguido por um gngster vingativo, enquanto o exrcito japons invade a regio.

programme.title: Retroceder Nunca, Render-se Jamais
programme.desc: Jason Stillwell um f de Bruce Lee e jovem aprendiz de artes marciais. Aps seu pai negar participar de uma gangue de criminosos, eles se mudam de cidade, onde Jason encontrar problemas.

programme.title: Como assaltar um banco
programme.desc: Ruggero um homem tranquilo, mas impulsivamente decide roubar um banco para provar que corajoso o suficiente para sua ex-mulher, que o abandonou.

programme.title: JACKASS: O Filme
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville e seus companheiros corajosos e estpidos fazem estripulias absurdas em nome da diverso. Eles invadem o Japo, onde se disfaram de pandas, atacam um campo de golfe e enfrentam jacars.

programme.title: Camuflagem
programme.desc: Marty um ator que tenta o sucesso em peas que no so bem sucedidas, at que conhece Jack Porter e tenta trabalhar como detetive ao seu lado. Esse encontro tem tudo para dar errado e terminar em muitas confuses.

programme.title: Confuses em Famlia
programme.desc: Nova York. Vince Rizzo (Andy Garcia) um guarda de priso que se surpreende ao ver o nome de um integrante de sua famlia entre os novos condenados. Trata-se de Tony Nardella (Steven Strait), seu filho, por ele abandonado h 20 anos.

programme.title: Negcio de Risco
programme.desc: Nas ruas de Detroit, em 1974, Chris Mankowski, um especialista em explosivos, comea a lidar com dinamites para a sua prxima misso criminosa. No entanto, o que ele no espera que sua parceria com Skip Gibbs gerar consequncias extremamente violentas

programme.title: Caindo na Estrada
programme.desc: Quando um vdeo muito picante de Josh (Breckin Meyer) ficando muito louco com a sensual Beth (Amy Smart) enviado acidentalmente para sua namorada, ele tem trs dias para chegar ao Texas antes que a fita chegue!

programme.title: Caindo na Estrada 2: O Jogo da Cerveja
programme.desc: Trs colegas de faculdade embarcam na jornada de suas vidas quando largam tudo para entrar em um nibus cheio de modelos sedutoras e pouco vestidas para competir na maior das competies esportivas: o Torneio Nacional do Jogo da Cerveja.

programme.title: Recm-Chegada
programme.desc: Uma empresria de Miami, Flrida, se ajusta sua nova vida em uma pequena cidade de Minnesota.

programme.title: A Recruta Hollywood
programme.desc: Com Jessica Simpson. Quando a famosa e doce estrela de cinema Megan Valentine se encontra sem dinheiro e humilhada, ela vagueia entre os destroos de um acidente de carro e ingenuamente se alista no Exrcito dos Estados Unidos.

programme.title: Espectador Profissional
programme.desc: Eddie Krumble, que trabalha como membro de audincias remuneradas de informeciais, conhece a fama do dia para a noite depois que um apresentador de talk show divulga seu trabalho.

programme.title: Um Romance na Alta Moda
programme.desc: Kate sonha em ser design de moda. Apesar de ser brilhante e talentosa, ningum deseja contrat-la, pois difcil confiar nela j que seu pai LeeKassell, uma varejista de roupas que so inspiradas nos designers para quem Kate deseja trabalhar.

programme.title: Um Sorriso como o Seu
programme.desc: Greg Kinnear interpreta um marido relutante em ter filhos, em uma comdia romntica sobre um casal que tenta conceber um beb.

programme.title: Rumo ao Sexo
programme.desc: Um adolescente desesperado para perder sua virgindade convence seus amigos a sarem em uma viagem com ele para conhecer uma garota que conheceu on-line, mas a viagem logo se revela uma srie de acidentes hilrios.

programme.title: A arte de se apaixonar
programme.desc: Uma artista que pinta um mural em uma nova ala hospitalar se apaixona pelo arquiteto do projeto, mas teme que ele no queira estar com ela se ela revelar a histria infeliz por trs de sua lista secreta de coisas para fazer.

programme.title: Desfile de Natal
programme.desc: Um belo prncipe espera convencer uma empresa de moda norte-americana a trazer mais negcios ao seu reino. Ele hospeda um desfile de moda de Natal, onde conhece um jovem assistente intrigante.

programme.title: Tinha Que Ser Voc
programme.desc: Um deprimido compositor de jingles de Nova York (Dustin Hoffman) e uma solitria burocrata britnica (Emma Thompson) se encontram por acaso em Londres, e um acaba transformando a vida do outro.

programme.title: A Noite da Realeza
programme.desc: Enquanto a Europa celebra o Dia V-E em 1945 (a rendio incondicional da Alemanha nazista na Segunda Guerra Mundial), a futura rainha Elizabeth e a princesa Margaret passam uma noite agitada em Londres.

programme.title: Coragem para Amar
programme.desc: Romance e intriga entram de forma inesperada na vida de Alex quando ele tenta salvar o negcio da famlia que herdou. Disfarado, ele tenta encontrar o problema e se encanta com Michelle, uma funcionria. Dividido, ele ter que fazer uma difcil escolha.

programme.title: Relao em Risco
programme.desc: Tyler Perry traz um drama eletrizante como nenhum outro. A vida pessoal e profissional de uma conselheira matrimonial torna-se complicada quando ela comea a se relacionar com um cliente.

programme.title: Proposta Indecente
programme.desc: Demi Moore e Woody Harrelson so Diana e David Murphy, um casal com problemas financeiros que esto apostando numa viagem rpida a Las Vegas para conseguir uma boa mo no jogo de cartas.

programme.title: Verdade e Justia
programme.desc: Em um territrio difcil, um homem e sua famlia lutam para construir seu lar e prosperar, mas os sonhos no se concretizam e tudo pode ser colocado a perder por uma obsesso.

programme.title: Vicky Cristina Barcelona
programme.desc: Durante suas frias de vero na Espanha, duas amigas se apaixonam pelo mesmo pintor, sem saber que sua ex-esposa, com quem ela tem um relacionamento tumultuado, est prestes a entrar em cena novamente.

programme.title: Fronteira
programme.desc: Um mexicano decide atravessar ilegalmente a fronteira dos Estados Unidos, no momento de sua travessia, ele percebe tiros em sua direo. O homem consegue escapar, mas uma mulher que passava pelo local morta.

programme.title: Juiz Arqueiro
programme.desc: Um homem, que encarregado de resolver algumas discuptas entre academinas rivais de artes marciais fica dividido. Ele no sabe se escolhe cumprir o dever do que lhe foi delegado ou se vinga a horna de sua famlia.

programme.title: Entre o Cu e o Inferno
programme.desc: Neste conto de amor, o indicado ao Oscar Samuel L. Jackson e Christina Ricci buscam a redeno no sul por meio do poder do blues e da transcendncia de uma amizade improvvel.

programme.title: As Duas Faces de um Crime
programme.desc: Um suspense de tribunal sobre um famoso advogado (Richard Gere) que assume o caso aparentemente impossvel de um coroinha (Edward Norton) acusado de matar um padre catlico.

programme.title: A Marca da Forca
programme.desc: Eles o cravaram de balas. Eles o penduraram pelo pescoo. Eles o deixaram para morrer. Mas eles cometeram dois erros fatais: eles tentaram enforcar o homem errado, e no terminaram o trabalho.

programme.title: Uma Pistola para Ringo
programme.desc: Aps assaltar o banco local, uma gangue liderada pelo cruel Sancho se refugia em uma fazenda tomando como refns seus habitantes.

programme.title: Jake Grando
programme.desc: Um velho pecuarista do Texas, que j viveu o ponto alto da vida, entra em ao quando bandidos sequestram seu neto e ferem seu filho.

programme.title: O Passado No Perdoa
programme.desc: A famlia Zachary uma famlia rica e influente do Texas, comandada por Ben e sua me, alm dos outros trs filhos, dois meninos e Rachel, que adotada.

programme.title: Colina dos Homens Maus
programme.desc: Um jovem pistoleiro, ferido em uma luta, escondido e cuidado por artistas de circo. O homem perseguido por alguns bandidos que querem se apropriar de sua mina de ouro. Quando os bandidos descobrem o esconderijo do pistoleiro, comea uma longa batalha.

programme.title: O Dlar Furado
programme.desc: Estados Unidos, segunda metade do sculo 19. Gary O'Hara um ex-capito do Exrcito dos Estados Confederados.

programme.title: Halloween III: A Noite das Bruxas
programme.desc: Um malvado fabricante de brinquedos planeja vender milhes de mscaras que mataro todas as crianas que as usarem no Halloween.

programme.title: Flashdance: Em Ritmo de Embalo
programme.desc: O sucesso visual e musical "Flashdance" conta a incrvel histria de Alex Owens (Jennifer Beals), uma linda e determinada mulher de 18 anos que trabalha como soldadora durante o dia e danarina em um bar da regio durante a noite.

programme.title: Proposta Indecente

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Notcias Tristes - S2E81
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi tem seu desejo atendido ao reencontrar Sasuke, mas Sasuke no mudou. Seu objetivo se vingar de seu irmo mais velho, Itachi. Os impulsos da Raposa de Nove Caudas incitam Naruto, mas Sasuke usa seu sharingan para suprimir a raposa.

programme.desc: Kakashi e a equipe dez partem para deter o akatsuki. Tsunade considera a equipe dez de naruto com o respaldo ideal para a equipe dez e manda naruto aperfeioar seu novo jutsu em 24 horas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Habilidades De Kakuzu - S2E84

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Gnio Shikamaru - S2E86

programme.desc: Naruto e a equipe kakashi chegam na hora certa para ajudar a equipe asuma. Sakura e sai receberam ordens de kakashi para ajudar shikamaru, que est lutando sozinho

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Preo Do Poder - S2E89

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Encontro - S2E92

programme.desc: One Piece - S4E46

programme.title: Nami chega um minuto atrasado estao, mas Sanji consegue se infiltrar a bordodo trem martimo!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E47

programme.title: Chopper e Nami arriscam suas vidas para salvar Luffy e Zoro de uma enorme coluna d'gua, enquanto Sanji luta para alcanar Robin!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E48

programme.title: Luffy e Nami pedem um navio emprestado para caar o trem martimo, mas o clima est muito impropcio para navegar. Por sorte, Iceburg e seus amigos esto repletos de surpresas!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E49

programme.title: Luffy, Zoro, Chopper e Nami aceleram ao encontro da CP9, mas precisaram fazer novos aliados para ter uma chance de sobreviver!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E50

programme.title: Zoro e Luffy enfrentam a fora da natureza, e Sanji segue sua misso de resgate, auxiliado pela chegada de Franky e de Sogeking!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E51

programme.title: Sogeking, um misterioso guerreiro da Ilha dos Atiradores, auxilia Franky e Sanji na busca de Robin.
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E52

programme.title: Sanji confronta um perigoso cozinheiro, Franky duela com o mais novo membro da CP9 e Sogeking precisa se valer de toda esperteza para conseguir alcanar Robin!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E53

programme.title: Franky e Sanji continuam a duelar contra a CP9. Enquanto isso, Luffy e os demais esto em uma rota de coliso que pode selar seus destinos!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E54

programme.title: Zoro enfrenta outro mestre espadachim, Sanji busca finalizar sua batalha contra o mestre do lmen e Franky desfere o golpe final contra seu inimigo!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E55

programme.title: Sogeking traa um ousado plano de fuga, mas os assassinos da CP9 so mais poderosos do que nossos heris poderiam imaginar. J Luffy e os demais reencontram um sapo familiar...
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E56

programme.title: O trem se aproxima de Enies Lobby, e as palavras gentis de Franky chegam a Robin. O trem de Luffy e companhia sai de seu curso, mas o grupo ganha um poderoso novo aliado!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E57

programme.title: Os Chapus de Palha planejam resgatar Robin, mas, como sempre, Luffy no dispensa briga. Sua impulsividade atrapalhar a misso?
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E58

programme.title: Luffy consegue chegar ilha principal, mas o ataque da Famlia Franky detido por um par de gigantes furiosos!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E59

programme.title: Luffy d cabo de centenas de soldados, a Famlia Franky derruba um dos gigantes e os assassinos da CP9 prestam contas a Spandam!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E60

programme.title: Zoro's quick thinking - and a little help from a giant frog - sends the sea train soaring into the sky on a collision course with armed guards and their canine companions!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E61

programme.title: Nami eletrocuta o inimigo com um ataque Clima Tact, mas os bandidos cercam os Chapus de Palha at que a Famlia Franky aparea com alguns monstros marinhos!
programme.desc: One Piece - S4E62

programme.title: Zoro, Sanji, Nami e Chopper tentam alcanar seu capito, Soge King no est em lugar algum, e Luffy corre de cabea para uma batalha com Blueno!

programme.title: Luffy mostra sua nova fora em combate contra Blueno, da CP9, e Sogeking se torna amigo de gigantes!

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II (1985)
programme.desc: A former Green Beret (Sylvester Stallone) goes on a reconnaissance mission to spring MIAs from a Viet Cong prison.

programme.title: Rambo III (1988)
programme.desc: Former Special Forces agent John Rambo blasts through Soviet-occupied Afghanistan in search of his captive mentor.

programme.title: Scream (1996)
programme.desc: A psycho killer targets a past victims daughter (Neve Campbell), while a tabloid TV reporter (Courteney Cox) homes in on his identity.

programme.title: Scream 2 (1997)
programme.desc: A masked killer continues to pursue a California student (Neve Campbell) and her friends at an Ohio college.

programme.title: Scream 3 (2000)
programme.desc: Murders draw a young woman (Neve Campbell), a reporter (Courteney Cox Arquette) and an ex-policeman (David Arquette) to the set of a movie inspired by horrific events that they survived.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction (1994)
programme.desc: Two hit men (John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson), a boxer, a crime boss and others meet their fates over the course of two days.

programme.title: Vampire in Brooklyn (1995)
programme.desc: A Caribbean vampire seeks the half-vampire, half-human New York homicide detective destined to be his bride.

programme.title: Limitless (2011)
programme.desc: An unemployed writer rises to the top of the financial world after an experimental drug gives him extraordinary mental acuity.

programme.title: Cloverfield (2008)
programme.desc: A group of friends venture deep into the streets of New York on a rescue mission during a rampaging monster attack.

programme.title: The Devil Inside (2012)
programme.desc: A woman (Fernanda Andrade) recruits two young exorcists to help her determine whether her mother, who murdered three people, is mentally ill or possessed by demons.

programme.title: The Survivalist (2021)
programme.desc: A year and a half after the fall of civilization due to a viral outbreak, a former FBI agent is forced to protect a young woman immune to the disease from a dangerous gang leader hunting her.

programme.title: Gone Baby Gone (2007)
programme.desc: Two private investigators (Casey Affleck, Michelle Monaghan) tread dangerous ground as they scour the Boston underworld for a kidnapped child.

programme.title: Night Falls on Manhattan (1996)
programme.desc: A fledgling district attorneys (Andy Garcia) probe of a New York Police Department scandal may implicate his father.

programme.title: Anthropoid (2016)
programme.desc: In December 1941, two Czech soldiers (Cillian Murphy, Jamie Dornan) parachute into their occupied homeland to assassinate Nazi officer Reinhard Heydrich (Detlef Bothe).

programme.title: Breaking In (2018)
programme.desc: A woman takes her two children on a weekend getaway to her late fathers secluded, high-tech estate in the countryside. She soon finds herself in a desperate fight to save all of their lives when four men break into the house to find hidden money.

programme.title: Fight Club (1999)
programme.desc: Two young professionals (Brad Pitt, Edward Norton) create an underground club where men can compete in hand-to-hand combat.

programme.title: Fight or Flight (2024)
programme.desc: A mercenary takes on the job of tracking a high-value asset known only as "The Ghost" on an international flight. Realizing the plane is filled with assassins assigned to kill them both, the pair must work together in a fight for their lives.

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Black (2016)
programme.desc: In a spoof of "Fifty Shades of Grey," wealthy entrepreneur Christian Black (Marlon Wayans) introduces a young woman (Kali Hawk) to his kinky world of SandM.

programme.title: All About the Benjamins (2002)
programme.desc: A bounty hunter and a con artist work together to retrieve a lottery ticket from a group of diamond thieves.

programme.title: Frank Millers Sin City (2005)
programme.desc: Lawmen, prostitutes (Devon Aoki, Alexis Bledel), a hulking thug and other sordid characters run amok in a crime-ridden metropolis.

programme.title: Approaching the Unknown (2016)
programme.desc: An American astronaut (Mark Strong) tests his will, sanity and endurance while embarking on a one-way, solo mission to Mars.

programme.title: Jacobs Ladder (1990)
programme.desc: A Vietnam vet prone to flashbacks walks the edge of sanity as he searches for the cause of his nightmarish visions.

programme.title: Heat (1995)
programme.desc: A wily bank robber (Robert De Niro) planning retirement leaves scant clues for a Los Angeles detective (Al Pacino) with family problems.

programme.title: Road to Perdition (2002)
programme.desc: Accompanied by his eldest son, a Depression-era mob enforcer (Tom Hanks) seeks revenge after the rest of his family are murdered by his employers (Paul Newman) jealous son.

programme.title: Nightcrawler (2014)
programme.desc: A freelance cameraman (Jake Gyllenhaal) goes to increasingly greater lengths to get shots of the most-lurid and disturbing crimes on the dark streets of Los Angeles.

programme.title: Switchback (1997)
programme.desc: A college student (Jared Leto) and a former rail worker (Danny Glover) are suspects in an FBI agents (Dennis Quaid) hunt for a serial killer who abducted his son.

programme.title: American Gigolo (1980)
programme.desc: A professional Beverly Hills escort falls in love with a big shots wife and winds up framed for murder.

programme.title: Heat (1995)
programme.desc: A wily bank robber (Robert De Niro) planning retirement leaves scant clues for a Los Angeles detective (Al Pacino) with family problems.

programme.title: Boogie Nights (1997)
programme.desc: A producer (Burt Reynolds) guides a young man (Mark Wahlberg) to success in the 1970s porn industry, but greed and egotism lead to his downfall in the 80s.

programme.title: Masterminds (2016)
programme.desc: An armored-car driver (Zach Galifianakis) helps a flirty co-worker (Kristen Wiig) and her friends pull off a heist, then finds himself holding the bag after they double-cross him.

programme.title: Wolves (2016)
programme.desc: A talented high school basketball players (Taylor John Smith) dreams of playing college ball are jeopardized by his hard-drinking fathers (Michael Shannon) compulsive gambling.

programme.title: Old Henry (2021)
programme.desc: A quiet man and his son take in a wounded stranger near his homestead, along with a bag full of cash. The stranger claims hes a sheriff being pursued by outlaws, but the man cant be sure.

programme.title: The Hunter (1980)
programme.desc: Modern bounty hunter Ralph "Papa" Thorson (Steve McQueen) hunts fugitives for a bail bondsman (Eli Wallach).

programme.title: The Ring (2002)
programme.desc: A journalist (Naomi Watts) investigates the mystery behind a bizarre videotape that brings death after seven days to all who view it.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity (2007)
programme.desc: A young couple (Katie Featherston, Micah Sloat) move into their first new home but are disturbed by what appears to be a supernatural presence that is most active at night.

programme.title: The Firm (1993)
programme.desc: A law-school grad uncovers a sinister secret about the Tennessee firm that made him an offer he couldnt refuse.

programme.title: Changing Lanes (2002)
programme.desc: An attorney and a recovering alcoholic have a car accident which swiftly escalates into an ongoing, bitter feud.

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears (2002)
